public class CharacterSetException
extends NLSRuntimeException
This class represents an exception has occurred in Oracle NLS runtime library due to problem in character set.

CharacterSetException(String)
Creates a new CharacterSetException with the specified detail message

CharacterSetException 
  public CharacterSetException(String s)
Creates a new CharacterSetException with the specified detail message
Parameters:
s - the detail message
